landing.headline:
Master anything,
remember everything.
landing.subheadline: A premium experience to memorize faster, with elegance and precision.
landing.usedBy: Used by students from top institutions
landing.aboutP1: Soma is built to help you learn better, not more. We focus on clarity, cognitive science, and spaced repetition to make every review session count.
landing.aboutP2: The product is designed as a quiet companion for serious learners. Every surface stays minimal so your attention stays on what matters.

auth.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.acceptTermsError: You must accept the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
auth.accountCreatedCheckEmail: Account created. Check your email then sign in.
auth.googleSignInError: Error signing in with Google. Please try again.
auth.subscriptionActiveSignIn: Your subscription is active. Sign in to access {appName}.
auth.confirmEmailFirst: Please confirm your email before signing in. Check your inbox.
auth.confirmEmailFirstWithSpam: Please confirm your email before signing in. Check your inbox (and spam folder).
auth.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials.
auth.noAccountFound: No account found with this email.
auth.profileCreating: Your profile is being created. Please wait a moment and try again.
auth.unexpectedError: An error occurred. Please try again.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Simple, student-friendly plans. Choose clarity and focus, not noise.
pricing.starterDesc: Generate up to 300 AI cards / month
pricing.proDesc: Generate up to 1 000 AI cards / month

dashboard.title: Statistics
dashboard.progressSubtitle: A quick overview of your activity.

settings.title: Settings
settings.inheritFromGlobal: Settings not customized will automatically inherit from global settings.
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings for this deck to global values?

decks.title: Decks
decks.createFirstDeck: Create your first deck to start learning
decks.newDeckDesc: Create a new deck to organize your cards.

deckOverview.emptyDeckHint: Use the {add} tab to create cards.
deckOverview.allUpToDate: All cards in this deck are up to date.
deckOverview.deleteConfirm: Delete this deck and all its cards and sub-decks?

deckSettings.deleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete "{deckName}"? This will also delete all sub-decks and all cards. This action is irreversible.
deckSettings.exportDesc: Export to Anki (.apkg) or JSON format will be available soon.
deckSettings.optionsDesc: Customize settings for this deck. Settings not defined will inherit from global settings.
deckSettings.errorTableMissing: The deck_settings table does not exist in your Supabase database. Please create the table by running the SQL provided in Supabase Dashboard.

browse.title: Browse
browse.noCardsHint: Add cards to any deck to see them here.
browse.clickToPreview: Click a card from the list to preview it
browse.failedToLoad: Failed to load cards. Please try again.

study.waitingForCards: Waiting for cards to become due
study.editCardDesc: Update the front and back of this card.

import.title: Import Document
import.uploadFile: Upload a PDF, image, or Anki (.apkg) file
import.pleaseWaitExtract: Please wait while we extract text from your document
import.reviewExtracted: Review the extracted text, then generate cards
import.selectAndEdit: Select and edit cards to add to your deck
import.pleaseWaitAnki: Please wait while we import your Anki deck
import.ankiHierarchy: Anki deck will be imported with its original hierarchy
import.truncateWarning: Text will be truncated to 20,000 characters for generation
import.llmUnavailable: LLM unavailable. Using local heuristic cards.

dueDate.title: Set due date
dueDate.description: Choose a new due date for this card.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Management
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site usage.
cookieConsent.details: By accepting, you authorize the use of analytical cookies (Google Analytics) to help us understand how you use our site.
